name: Among Oceans
description:
Cavin woke up and found herself lying on the sand of an isolated island where the whole story begins.

- Current  and Upcoming Features -
  • Change Your Weapon, Change Your Class as well as Your Spell Tree.
  • Real-time Combat.
  • Fishing System.
  • Cooking System.
  • Collecting System.
  • Interactive Tutorial.
  • Days & Nights.
  • Blacksmith System. (In development)
  • Alchemy System. (In development)
  • Trading System. (In development)
  • Boat Driving System. (In development)
  • Ship Battle System. (In development)
  • Non-linear narrative. (In development)
- First Chapter -

This is a very early prototype, only the first chapter and about half of the key features are included.  Following chapters and upcoming features are in developement. If you have any feedback you'd like to share, please feel free to leave comments below or email me.  All responces are appreciated, and will help me in improving the full game.

- Devlog -
  • v1.0.2 General Update: Water render upgrade and combat system optimize.
  • v1.0.1 Bugfixes.
  • v1.0.0 First Release.
